name: OpenAI — News
notes: Official announcements and technical updates. Some feed readers may need a normal User-Agent header.

name: OpenAI — Blog
notes: Official long-form posts. Some feed readers may need a normal User-Agent header.

name: Google Blog — AI (The Keyword category)
notes: Official Google blog RSS endpoint linked from the AI category pages; you may need to filter by category on your side.

name: Google Research — Blog (site feed)
notes: Research posts; the site is authoritative, but an explicit RSS URL is not clearly exposed on-page.

name: Microsoft Research — Blog
notes: In-depth articles written by MSR researchers.

name: BAIR (Berkeley AI Research) — Blog
notes: Researcher-written posts from Berkeley AI Research.

name: MIT News — Artificial Intelligence topic
notes: Primary MIT News posts tagged to AI.

name: arXiv — cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence)
notes: Primary preprint stream (not commentary). Good for detecting new papers early.

name: arXiv API (Atom; queryable)
notes: Programmatic feed (Atom). Useful if your tool supports Atom and you want query control.

name: NVIDIA Developer Blog
notes: Strong for applied AI systems, inference/training optimization, hardware/software co-design.

name: The Gradient (researcher-written magazine)
notes: Long-form analysis and interviews by researchers/builders.

name: AI Alignment Forum
notes: Primary venue for technical alignment writing; high-signal but narrower focus.

name: Distill (archival, still useful)
notes: Not current, but foundational explanations; good for evergreen depth.
